minissu hithan inne hamba karanna amaruyi , wiyadam karanna lesiyi kiyalane.namuth mama kiyanne eeke anith paththa.oona kenekta mudal hoyaganna kramweda oona tharam soyaganna puluwan.namuth wiyadam karana eka thamayi amaru.wiyadam karana eka thamayi amaruma.wiyadam karana eka hari amaruwen , mahansiyen , buddhiyen yuthuwa kala yuthuyi.hamawelawema wiyadam karanna amaruyi kiyana eka oluwe thiyaganna ooni.anawashyaya wiydam kapa hariya yuthuyi.mama mage wiyadam kotas hayakata khedagena thiyenawa.aahara , kheheth , athyawashya bilpath sandaha, winodathmaka katayuthu , daruwange adhyapana saha wahana nadaththu saha indhana kiyala.menna me wiyadam walata galapena aadayamak thiyenawa nam , ee wiyadam ganan hadala balala palanaya kaloth anawashya widihata wiyadam wenne na.

thamanta sidukarana kenehilikam nathara kirima sandaha madhyama palath sabhawe wipaksha nayaka ranjith aluwihare mahathata masa thunaka pariwasa kalasimawak labadimata thaman sudanam bawa madhyama palath sabha ejapa manthriwarun wana sanjiwa kawirathna mahathwaru ha rohana bandaranayaka yana ejapa nayakathwa mandala sabhapathiwarayata danumdi thibe.me pariwasa kalasimawa thula ohu thama waradi niwaradi kara nogathahoth palath sabhawa thula ohu samanga sahayogayen kriya nokarana bawath eeta thawath manthri pirisak sahaya dimata sudanamin sitina bawath me manthriwaru ejapa nayakathwa mandala sabhapathi karu jayasuriya mahathata pawasa atha.me gataluwa wisandima sandaha pakshaya ganna idiri kriyamarga matha madhyama palath sabhawe ejapa manthriwarun sabhawa thula kriyakarana aakaraya thiranaya wana bawath wipaksha nayakawaraya ada abhiyoga karanne wipakshayata nowa thamanta abhiyogayak wana pakshayema manthriwarunta bawath sanjiwa kawirathna mahatha pawasayi..
